group_1.narration: Magical Girls suddenly received@a mysterious message on their phones.
Rumor has it that if you reply to it,@telling it what you want...

group_1.textRight: Well then, let's get going!
We're the messengers who are gonna dash@through the night to bring happiness!
Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: ...delivery...

group_1.textRight: [chara:100350:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I can barely hear you!
Rena, are you REALLY committed to delivering@joy to everyone?!
Louder! LOUDER!

group_1.textLeft: Ugh, this is so embarrassing...

group_1.textRight: Okay, from the top!
Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: Delivery Service...
Was that good enough?

group_1.textRight: SPARKLE!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100950:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textRight: That's the sound of my bright red nose@lighting our way through the night!

group_1.textCenter: We've got a lot of joy to give to everyone!

group_1.textLeft: You don't even have a red nose...

group_1.narration: Run fast, run fast, little reindeer♪
Dashing through the midnight sky,@stardust a-whirl!♪
Every speck of stardust@makes a miracle unfold♪
Check your stockings, see what they hold!♪

group_1.textCenter: Tsuruno, it's that house over there!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! We gotta get to everyone while it's@still dark!
Yep yep!

group_1.textLeft: So this is what you needed me for...@My transformation ability.
I'm not really sure what I get out of this.
But if this's gonna make Kaede and the@others happy...
Let's just do it.

group_1.textRight: Whoa!
AHHH!
WHAT'S GOING ON?!

group_1.textLeft: You know it's too early for that kind of@noise... What's going on?

group_1.textRight: This! Look!!!
It was next to my bed! Tickets to see the@new Decagon Ball movie!

group_1.textLeft: Next to your bed?!
So, you got something too?

group_1.textRight: You got a present, Yachiyo?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
When I woke up this morning, I found a@brand new kitchen knife on my nightstand.

group_1.textRight: Oh, me too... A book about punishments@through history, though...

group_1.textLeft: Was that...something you wanted?

group_1.textRight: Um, yes... I was a bit interested in it...
It's probably some kind of Rumor, huh?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Momoko, how long have you been there?!

group_1.textRight: It seems like other Magical Girls had stuff@delivered to them too.
So Kaede wanted to check with you guys.
Yes! A pretty new plant showed up at my@house!
So I was wondering if maybe other people got@presents too...
Rena, you were here with Iroha?!
So that's why you weren't there when we@called your house.

group_1.textLeft: So? It's not like I need permission to go@places...

group_1.textRight: Well that's true... Did you get something,@Rena?

group_1.textLeft: Come to think of it, we haven't heard what@Iroha and Tsuruno received either.

group_1.textCenter: I didn't think about getting something for@us...

group_1.textRight: Even if we make something up, we don't@have anything to show them...

group_1.textLeft: We'll just have to ignore the question.

group_1.textRight: Um...
Well...

group_1.textLeft: I see...*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Uh, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, nothing. Don't mind me.
Anyway, it seems like all of us got@something.
Huh?! Ren, you got something too?!

group_1.textRight: Yes...next to my bed... A diary with the@design I really liked...

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?@The Rumor of the "Joy Delivery Service."

group_1.textLeft: I was wondering why you looked so happy@today, but now I understand.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I sensed something beside me, then@I noticed there was this tea by my bed.

group_1.narration: A strange account suddenly showed up@on everyone's messaging app.

group_1.textLeft: So can you piece together what you felt@beside you to figure out who it was?

group_1.textRight: Some round person left behind a cute stuffed@animal for me...

group_1.narration: If you send a message telling them what you@want...then happiness will come to you.

group_1.textLeft: I mean, I really don't think you'd lie to@me, Masara, but...

group_1.textRight: I saw it. Without a shadow of a doubt.@A person in red with a beard...

group_1.narration: It's a hot Rumor among@Kamihama Magical Girls!

group_1.textLeft: I think those mangas you've been@reading have rotted your brain.

group_1.textRight: I'm telling you...that magic I felt, I@recognized it from somewhere...

group_1.narration: Could such a thing be true?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! You can believe it!

group_1.textCenter: You've all got something waiting for you too,@for sure!

group_1.textLeft: We have no idea who it's from, though.@But don't sweat the details.
